title: Kasalong Gardens Home
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Indian, Thai, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chill place with 2 tables in a pebble garden in the courtyard of a guesthouse, opened Sept 2013. Menu features breakfast food, curry and vegetable dishes with tofu and brown rice (no red meat), plus fruit and vegetable juices, smoothies, and lassi. Try a hearty vegetable and pumpkin soup or a vegan burger. The friendly owner is also the cook.
